entry_groups.name: 【リポート！】Vtuber at EVO Japan 2023 Short Vlog & TEKKEN 7 FINALS
entry_groups.description:
For a more indepth video about my experience:
https://www.youtube.com/live/qj8CLiTG7iw?feature=share

I went to EVO Japan 2023 and it was my first time!
Everyone I met were so kind and I had a lot of fun. I did see good points and some negative points I hope would be fixed for next year but I really do value the experience! 

I came for TEKKEN and saw the finals in person! I also included some reactions of the TEKKEN 8 character reveals as well into the video. 

I have a lot of respect to the players who competed and hope that I will get another chance to go to EVO again!

I went more indepth of my experience of EVO Japan in my other stream so feel free to check it out!

▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△
